tthread::thread::id

Detailed Description

Thread ID.

The thread ID is a unique identifier for each thread.

See also:
thread::get_id()

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

id (  )  [inline]

Default constructor.

The default constructed ID is that of thread without a thread of execution.
